name: BYU Law School Website
description: From start to finish, I helped implement a full migration and redesign of the Law School's public informational website. The site went live in May 2024.

name: WikiRealms
description: Using the design project in one of our courses, my team is working to build a web application designed to help prospective authors organize, manage, and share their worldbuilding ideas.

name: Fake Profile Wizard
description: I'm currently working to develop the frontend for our research team's Wizard--a mobile app designed to help Autistic adults identify bad actors on Facebook.
error: Preview unavailable: Wizard is still being developed.

name: Resume Website
description: This is the site you're on! My website is a custom space I built to showcase the skills I've learned and the projects I've been involved with.

name: Tweeter
description: A Twitter clone built as a full stack web application. I built the backend from scratch, and the frontend was refactored using common software design patterns.
error: Site is down to minimize AWS costs. Contact Sara for more information.

name: Game Night
description: A static website designed to display, organize, and filter board game information. Our team conducted a contextual inquiry and card sorting study to inform the deisgn.
